item.title: EP 114 - Ghost Boats!
item.itunes:title: Ghost Boats!
item.description:
Today we look at Organic Black Helicopters, investigate a laughing epidemic that infected 1000 people, and then we hitch a ride on a ghost boat!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

“Organic Black Helicopters” is a phrase found on the Conspiracy Iceberg. Is it a real lifeform that hovers over us in the darkness or is it an elaborate prank?

Then we travel to Africa to try to find the root cause of the Tanganyika Laughter Epidemic. 1000 people were infected with a madness that made them laugh uncontrollably for days on end.

And finally we sail/float down the Tombigbee River, but bring your life vest! We’re traveling on two haunted ghost boats!

Links:

National Directory Of Haunted Places

https://amzn.to/2RWNccX

The TRUTH About Black Helicopters!

https://zapatopi.net/blackhelicopters/

Black helicopter

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_helicopter

Obama Admits: "There Are Black Helicopters"

http://phasezero.gawker.com/obama-admits-there-are-black-helicopters-1713038795

Stealth helicopter

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stealth_helicopter

Tanganyika laughter epidemic

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tanganyika_laughter_epidemic

The Many Theories Behind The Strange Tanganyika Laughter Epidemic

https://www.urbo.com/content/the-many-theories-behind-the-strange-tanganyika-laughter-epidemic/

The 1962 Laughter Epidemic of Tanganyika Was No Joke

https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/the-1962-laughter-epidemic-of-tanganyika-was-no-joke

James T. Staples

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_T._Staples

JAMES T. STAPLES RIVERBOAT

https://ghostlyworld.org/2012/12/02/james-t-staples-riverboat/

Ask Rufus: Ghosts of the Tombigbee

http://www.cdispatch.com/printerfriendly.asp?aid=37506

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
"As Above" Art By Grant Scott
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadrabbitradio/

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
